raids.name: Ancient Scarbs
raids.message: Something crawls from deep in the Rookgaard Desert!

raids.name: Ashmunrah
raids.message: The pharaoh is angry that they walk the corridors of his tomb!

raids.name: Brutus Bloodbeard
raids.message: Old Brutus Bloodbeard has a hat that dazzles just like his attacks!

raids.name: Deadeye Devious
raids.message: The blind Deadeye Devious hears you from far away, he is waiting for you!

raids.name: Demodras
raids.message: he dragon boss Demodras has appeared and seeks to exterminate all humans!

raids.name: Grovehorn
raids.message: The forests tremble because of the appearance of so many horns!

raids.name: Lethal Lissy
raids.message: Lethal Lissy with her shiny shirt is waiting for you for the fight!

raids.name: Lord of the depth
raids.message: From the depths of hell his enraged representative has appeared!

raids.name: Ron the Ripper
raids.message: Ron the ripper is with his sharp sabre waiting for his next victim!

raids.name: Soulharvester
raids.message: The souls flee from the cemetery, because an abysmal being is consuming them!

raids.name: The Old Widow
raids.message: Many legs, many eyes, many deaths...the old widow is here!
